mapper.select: SELECT t1.dbid_, t1.dbversion_, t1.id_, t1.procdefid_, t1.key_, t1.start_, t1.end_, t1.duration_, t1.state_, t1.endactivity_, t1.nextidx_, t1.main_id_ from JBPM4_HIST_PROCINST t1 where t1.id_=#{str}

SELECT t1.dbid_, t1.dbversion_, t1.id_, t1.procdefid_, t1.key_, t1.start_, t1.end_, t1.duration_, t1.state_, t1.endactivity_, t1.nextidx_, t1.main_id_ FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RN FROM ( SELECT hp.* FROM JBPM4_HIST_PROCINST hp WHERE hp.state_!='active' and hp.end_<=to_date(#{dateStr},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #{maxNum} ) t1 WHERE t1.RN >= #{startNum}
select count(*) from tabs t where t.TABLE_NAME='JBPM4_HIST_PROCINST_OLD'
mapper.insert:
insert into JBPM4_HIST_PROCINST_OLD ( dbid_, dbversion_, id_, procdefid_, key_, start_, end_, duration_, state_, endactivity_, nextidx_, main_id_
)( select hp.dbid_, hp.dbversion_, hp.id_, hp.procdefid_, hp.key_, hp.start_, hp.end_, hp.duration_, hp.state_, hp.endactivity_, hp.nextidx_, hp.main_id_ from JBPM4_HIST_PROCINST hp where hp.end_<=to_date(#{str},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') and hp.state_!='active' )

insert into JBPM4_HIST_PROCINST_TMP ( dbid_, dbversion_, id_, procdefid_, key_, start_, end_, duration_, state_, endactivity_, nextidx_, main_id_
)( select hp.dbid_, hp.dbversion_, hp.id_, hp.procdefid_, hp.key_, hp.start_, hp.end_, hp.duration_, hp.state_, hp.endactivity_, hp.nextidx_, hp.main_id_ from JBPM4_HIST_PROCINST hp where hp.end_<=to_date(#{str},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') and hp.state_!='active' )
mapper.update: create table JBPM4_HIST_PROCINST_OLD as select * from JBPM4_HIST_PROCINST a where a.dbid_=0
create table JBPM4_HIST_PROCINST_TMP as select * from JBPM4_HIST_PROCINST a where a.dbid_=0
mapper.insert:
insert into JBPM4_HIST_PROCINST_OLD ( dbid_, dbversion_, id_, procdefid_, key_, start_, end_, duration_, state_, endactivity_, nextidx_, main_id_
)( select hp.dbid_, hp.dbversion_, hp.id_, hp.procdefid_, hp.key_, hp.start_, hp.end_, hp.duration_, hp.state_, hp.endactivity_, hp.nextidx_, hp.main_id_ from JBPM4_HIST_PROCINST hp where hp.id_=#{str} )
mapper.delete: delete from JBPM4_HIST_PROCINST t where exists (select temp.dbid_ from JBPM4_HIST_PROCINST_TMP temp where t.dbid_=temp.dbid_)
delete from JBPM4_HIST_PROCINST hp where hp.id_=#{str}
